cs.IT, cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.CC. 

The paper deals with distributed secret sharing, which is a topic that falls under the umbrella of information theory and cryptography. Therefore, cs.IT (Information Theory) and cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also involves distributed systems, which could fall under cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) and cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms). Finally, the paper discusses communication complexity and storage overhead, which are topics that could fall under cs.CC (Computational Complexity) as well.
